ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Equipment Upgrades.....
ygData.msgSnippet: swap out the agi stuff. a lowly bronze bracer provides a LOT more protection than a serp bracer.  (ie, grab a pair of symbol of loyalty to vox if you want to
ygData.messageBody:
swap out the agi stuff. a lowly bronze bracer provides a LOT more protection
than a serp bracer. (ie, grab a pair of symbol of loyalty to vox if you
want to keep steel bracer look, or a pair of lambent bracers)

lambent bp is worlds better than the mithril bp, also looks better with
lambent arms/legs imho.

i'd also change the choker to a runed lava pendant or a cape of midnight
mist. (2 real ac is better than 6 agi and 0 ac) tho o/c you may want to
watch your procs since dex unfortunately tied to a lot of your agi gear.

-----Original Message-----
From: John_Senior@... [mailto:John_Senior@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 05, 2000 12:44 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Equipment Upgrades.....


I am a level 43 (almost 44) Bard on Veeshan and I was wondering if anyone
could suggest what equipment of mine I should get rid of and what I should
replace it with, this is what I am wearing.....
